nodes.text: The Tambles were a family of sentient beings similar to pufferfish, who bounced along the surface of rivers; without water, they would die. The Tambles lived on the forest moon of Endor. It is unknown whether "Tamble" was the family's species or surname.

Tamble are a peaceful species who enjoy their lives and who need water to survive. The Tamble are not warriors or fighters and are to afraid to stand up for themselves. Due to their lack of bravery and their peaceful kindness this allowed a Blog to move in and take over their home. The Tamble will flee and hide when there is danger.
